nodes.text: Issagra space station was a space station located in the Issagra system of the Corporate Sector, in orbit of the planet Issagra.

Issagra could hold more than 10,000 visitors, could hold more than 100 freighters of cargo, and was over 3 kilometers in length. The station served as a center of trade and was notable for its gambling. It was a haven for criminals. Organized crime groups were always in hiding in the background of Issagra Station, and contraband was not uncommon.
The wealthy Rodian gambler Garoush was present in a casino on Issagra space station when he ran into a group of spacers on the run from another group of bounty hunters.
